course_content.core:
Semester 01
Anatomy - Spine, Upper Limb, Lower Limb, Thorax, Abdomen & Pelvis (Part 1)
Biochemistry
Human Biology
Chiropractic Palpation & Topographic Anatomy (Part 1)
Philosophy & History of Medicine & Chiropractic
MPU U1- Falsafah & Isu Semasa (Philosophy & Current Issues)
MPU U1- Penghayatan Etika & Peradaban
MPU U3- Kursus Integriti & Antirasuah (Integrity & Anti-Corruption)  Semester 02
Anatomy - Spine, UpperLimb, Lower Limb, Thorax, Abdomen & Pelvis (Part 2)
Chiropractic Palpation & Topographic Anatomy (Part 2)
Microbiology
Physics (for Chiropractic)
Physiology (Part 1)
MPU U2- Academic Communication
MPU U4- Social Responsibility  Semester 03
Anatomy - Head & Neck
Rehabilitation & Trigger Point Therapy
Clinical Nutrition (for Chiropractic)
Pathology (Part 1)
Physiology (Part 2)
Radiography (for Chiropractic)  Semester 04
Neuroanatomy
Biomechanics
Auxiliary Therapeutics & Rehabilitation
Communicable Diseases & Immunology
Critical Thinking & Communication Skills
Pathology (Part 2)  Semester 05
Chiropractic Assessment & Diagnosis (Part 1)
Chiropractic Spinal Manipulative Therapy
Diagnostic Imaging (Part 1)
Non-communicable Diseases
Physical Examination & Diagnosis (Part 1)  Semester 06
Physical Examination & Diagnosis (Part 2)
Chiropractic Assessment & Diagnosis (Part 2)
Diagnostic Imaging (Part 2)
Pharmacology
Introductory Psychology (for Chiropractic)
Chiropractic Extremity Joint Manipulative Therapy  Semester 07
Clinical Chiropractic & Patient Management (CCPM)
First Aid & Emergency Conditions
Medical Ethics & Professionalism
Research Methodology & Biostatistics
Special Populations (Geriatrics & Pediatrics)
Introduction to Traditional & Complementary Medicine  Semester 08
Chiropractic Clinical Practicum 1 (Part 1)
Chiropractic Techniques
Research Project (Part 1)
Special Populations, Sports & Special Needs  Semester 09
Chiropractic Clinical Practicum 1 (Part 2)
Practice, Business Management & Entrepreneurship
Research Project (Part 2)  Semester 10
Chiropractic Clinical Practicum 2  Clinical Internship During Semesters 8, 9, and 10, students will undertake clinical internships at the IMU Healthcare Chiropractic Centre or at any other approved institution. Ensuring public safety and patient care, our clinical training practicum is designed with safety protocols under the supervision of experienced professionals. This commitment to safety is integral to our programme outcomes, constantly monitored to meet and exceed professional standards, preparing our students for effective and safe practice.

entry_requirements_raw.A-Level: Minimum Grade BBB or ABC in Biology, Chemistry and Physics / Mathematics.

Grade B4 in Biology,Chemistry,Physics and Advanced Mathematics (I) and (II).  SPM-level or equivalent:
minimum 5Bs including Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry, Physics
entry_requirements_raw.Diploma:
Diploma in Health Sciences with minimum CGPA 3.50 and provided the course is not less than 5 semesters or 2.5 years in the same accredited institution.  SPM-level or equivalent:
attained 2Bs each in Biology, Chemistry or Physics, and 3Cs in English, Mathematics or Additional Mathematics and another subject at SPM / O-level
entry_requirements_raw.STPM: BBB or ABC in Biology; and Chemistry; and Physics or Mathematics.
entry_requirements_raw.Foundation:
Pass with CGPA 3.00 in Biology, Chemistry, Physics/Mathematics.  SPM-level or equivalent:
attained 5Bs in Biology, Chemistry, Physics, Mathematics/ Additional Mathematics and another subject at SPM/O-Level
entry_requirements_raw.CPU:
Average of 80% in 3 subjects i.e. Biology; and Chemistry; and Physics or Mathematics).  SPM-level or equivalent:
attained 5Bs in Biology, Chemistry, Physics, Mathematics / Additional Mathematics and Malay/English at SPM / O-level or its equivalent
entry_requirements_raw.IB Diploma:
30 points with a minimum score of 5 each in 3 of the following subjects Biology; and Chemistry; and Physics / Mathematics with a minimum of 2 subjects at Higher Level (HL) and one subject at Standard Level (SL).  SPM-level or equivalent:
attained 5Bs in Biology, Chemistry, Physics, Mathematics/Additional Mathematics and Malay/English at SPM / O-Level or its equivalent
entry_requirements_raw.SACE/WACE:
ATAR 80 including Biology; and Chemistry; and Physics or Mathematics.  SPM-level or equivalent:
attained 5Bs in Biology, Chemistry, Physics, Mathematics/Additional Mathematics and Malay/English at SPM / O-Level or its equivalent
